items.summary: Add a download options menu in the Admin Dashboard that allows admins to download files (documents, deliverables, to-do attachments) in the following formats: PDF, spreadsheet (XLSX/CSV), document (DOCX), CSV, ZIP folder, or image (PNG/JPG). The download button should present a dropdown with these format options. For formats that require conversion (e.g., exporting a list as CSV or ZIP), generate the file client-side from available data. For file blobs already stored (e.g., uploaded documents and deliverables), provide direct download with the selected format extension. ZIP downloads should bundle multiple selected files into a single archive.
Remove the '99.8% filling accuracy' statistic and the 'client support 24/7' text from all locations in the frontend UI where they currently appear (likely on the HomePage stats/marketing section).
